member.name: T:UnityProjectArchitect.AI.Services.IHttpClientWrapper
member.summary: Interface for HTTP client operations Unity implementation will use UnityWebRequest, standalone uses HttpClient

member.summary: Standard HttpClient implementation for standalone scenarios

member.name: T:UnityProjectArchitect.AI.Services.ILogger
member.summary: Interface for logging operations Unity implementation will use Debug.Log, standalone uses Console or other logger

member.name: T:UnityProjectArchitect.AI.Services.NullLogger
member.summary: No-op logger for scenarios where logging is not needed

member.name: T:UnityProjectArchitect.AI.Services.ISettingsProvider
member.summary: Interface for providing encrypted settings storage Unity implementation will use EditorPrefs, standalone can use registry/file

member.summary: Simple in-memory settings provider for testing and standalone scenarios
